reviews.review_msg: One of my favourite professors--extremely knowledgeable, willing to help, organized, fair marker, passionate about her work. I liked how she wasn't afraid to adjust the syllabus when students asked interesting questions that required more explanation and discussion. Will definitely take more of her courses.

I had Cecile a year and a half ago. I found her to be very intimidating, but after I finished with my major, I realized that she was one of the best Profs I've had. In her office she is a very different person-Very nice, funny, and honest. She has very high expectations which is what I truly appreciated in the end.Not my best mark, but my best prof
